reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Indonesia HIV Response: Eliminating the AIDS epidemic in Indonesia by 2030

description.narrative: Indonesia - HIV - Yayasan Spiritia - Spiritia. This program has the following goals: Elimination HIV and AIDS as a public health risk. Advances in achieving the global 90-90-90 targets. The objectives of this program are: Implementation of more differentiated approaches to outreach, testing and treatment, care and support services. Expansion of the focus program of program initiatives to include all PLHIV and strategically chosen population sub-groups. More rapid decentralization of comprehensive services to primary care levels to facilitate closer lingkages between HIV testing and treatment and between HIV and TB and PMTCT. Increased community engagement to overcome some of the most daunting challenges in accessing services. improved use of data to guide program planning and management and facilitate continual quality improvement. Tightened geographic targeting of resources and efforts to optimize impact
